questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of the displayed footwear?

Can you describe the visible design feature present on the sole, near the heel area?

What type of visible markings or labels can be seen on the insole?

Looking at the structural integrity, how many layers of material can be visually confirmed?
